vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.37;
son of: Moza (H4162H);
father of: Raphah (H7498), Eleasah (H0501H) and Azel (H0682A)
§ Binea or Bineah = fountain
a descendant of Jonathan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Mosá; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比尼亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "泉水"
約拿單的後裔 (代上8:37,9:43)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比尼亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "泉水"
约拿单的后裔 (代上8:37,9:43)
